testcase.name: #1 did the max length of columns get returned?
#2 did the same label get returned for a label with length=1?
#3 did the same label get returned for a label with length=2?
#4 did the shortened label get returned for a label with length>=3 (pass in shorter label)?
#5 did the shortened label get returned for a label with length>=3 (pass in longer label)?
#6 did the shortened label get returned while reversing the order of tool labels (pass in shorter label)?
#7 did the shortened label get returned while reversing the order of tool labels (pass in longer label)?
#8 did the shortened label get returned with a blank parameters object?
#9 did the shortened label get returned with one empty parameters object + 1 valid (shorter) parameters object?
#10 does the initialized matrix exclude single-column labels?
#11 did the tools get sorted correctly?
#12 did sorted tools get left unchanged?
#13 were the correct labels returned based on the current row requested?
#14 were the correct labels returned based on the current row requested?
#15 were the label counts returned correctly?
#16 were the label counts returned correctly based on being in different columns only?
#17 was the label with the most columns returned?
#18 was the label with the most columns returned?
#19 was an empty string returned if no labels are requesting the current row?

testsuite.name: test getLabelWithMostColumns - check reverse alphabetically sorted second

testcase.name: #20 was the label with the most columns firstly and reverse alphabetically prioritized second selected?
#21 did we get the expected row (1)?
#22 did we get the expected row (2)?
#23 did we get the expected sorting?
#24 did the tools get sorted correctly?
#25 did we get the expected sorting?
